verses.verse: Then the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> from the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5927>going<s%> up from <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> through the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>
And it <S%H3318>went<s%> from <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> and <S%H5674>continued<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H757>Archites<s%> at <S%H5852>Ataroth.<s%>

And it <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of the <S%H3311>Japhletites,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of <S%H8481>lower<s%> Beth-horon even to <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Now [this] was the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> was Ataroth-addar, as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5945>upper<s%> Beth-horon.

Then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> at <S%H4366>Michmethath<s%> on the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> to Taanath-shiloh, and <S%H5674>continued<s%> [beyond] it to the <S%H4217>east<s%> of <S%H9192>Janoah.<s%>

And it <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H9192>Janoah<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth<s%> and to <S%H5292>Naarah,<s%> then <S%H6293>reached<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and <S%H3318>came<s%> out at the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

From <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1980>continued<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7071>Kanah,<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%>

[together] with the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which were <S%H3995>set<s%> <S%H3995>apart<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

But they did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer,<s%> so the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H5647>laborers.<s%> <S%H4522><s%>
